Don't you think?$3"/pause 400/move Wizard 0 -3 0 true/speak Wizard "M. Rasmodius. So I have been very careful not to let anyone who would abuse it know.$5"/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 400/speak Wizard "I trust you enough to tell you.$6"/faceDirection Wizard 2/speak Wizard "Magnus. My name is Magnus.$4"/faceDirection Wizard 1/speak Wizard "Please. From now on, when we're alone, won't you please call me that?$6"/end dialogue Wizard "I never thought there'd be someone again who I'd trust this much.$4"
